column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cold Tapas: I had the green beans
column2: roasted tomatoes and shallots. And it was excellent
column3: the beans were crisp and everything was well flavored. I also had the asparagus with grilled red onions and red pepper. The red onions and peppers were really good but the asparagus lacked flavor
column4: although cooked to just the right crispness.
